curam.util.ctm.bom

Interface SecurityBOM

  • All Superinterfaces:
    BusinessObjectModule
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    ApplicationConfigSecurityBOMImpl, AppResourceSecurityBOMImpl, CodeTableHierarchySecurityBOMImpl, CodeTableSecurityBOMImpl, CSSAppResourceSecurityBOMImpl, EventSecurityBOMImpl, ImageAppResourceSecurityBOMImpl, PropertiesAppResourceSecurityBOMImpl, PropertiesSecurityBOMImpl, RulesSecurityBOMImpl, SchemaAppResourceSecurityBOMImpl, SectionConfigSecurityBOMImpl, SecurityGroupSecurityBOMImpl, SecurityIdentifierSecurityBOMImpl, SecurityRoleSecurityBOMImpl, TabConfigSecurityBOMImpl, XMLAppResourceSecurityBOMImpl, XSLTemplateSecurityBOMImpl

    public interface SecurityBOM
extends BusinessObjectModule

    Security module provides a mechanism to define security identifier for each BusinessObjectModule.

    Individual business object module are expected to define read and write security identifier, which infrastructure will use to determine if user is eligible to read/write a business object. If the logged in user is not allowed to access the content, the process is aborted, and an error message indicating the issue is return to the user.
